summary: This document consists of Bureau of Prisons count sheets, inmate rosters, and out-count forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on August 4, 2019. It records inmate counts by housing unit, special assignments (including to the hospital), and lists inmates scheduled for out-counts. Notably, it includes Jeffrey Epstein's inmate roster entry and a running count log for that day.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed on an inmate roster with register number 76318-054, assigned to housing unit Z04-206LAD, with an OCT assignment of ATTY (attorney) and work status UNASSG on August 4, 2019.

persons.context: Listed on an inmate roster with register number 89673-053, assigned to HOSP (hospital) on August 4, 2019, with a work status of SUICIDE OR.

events.title: Daily Inmate Counts at MCC New York
events.description: Routine administrative counts of inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, were conducted throughout the day, recording census numbers by housing unit (B-A, C-A, E-N, E-S, G-N, G-S, H-A, I-N, K-N, K-S, R-A, Z-A, Z-B). The total inmate population was recorded as 762 during pre-check counts.

events.title: Epstein Listed on Inmate Roster
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is recorded on an inmate roster with register number 76318-054, housed in unit Z04-206LAD, with an assignment category of ATTY (attorney visit) and unassigned work status.

events.title: Hospital Assignments for Inmates
events.description: Inmates 'Mersey' and 'Weber' are recorded as being assigned to HOSP (hospital) with work statuses noted as 'SUICIDE OR', indicating a possible suicide watch or observation.

events.title: Out-Counts Scheduled
events.description: Official out-count forms list inmates scheduled to be out of their housing units for various reasons (e.g., court, medical) at specific times, requiring approval from an Operations Lieutenant.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on August 4, 2019, with register number 76318-054 and was housed in unit Z04-206LAD.
The total inmate population at MCC New York on August 4, 2019, was recorded as 762 during pre-check counts.
The documents include routine prison administrative records such as count sheets, inmate rosters, and out-count forms, showing standard operational procedures.
At least two other inmates ('Mersey' and 'Weber') were assigned to the hospital (HOSP) with work statuses noted as 'SUICIDE OR' on the same day.
Multiple other inmates are listed on out-count forms and rosters, indicating movements and assignments within the facility.
